00052 void Text::addCharacter (const char &character, const unsigned int &position)
00053 {
00054     if(position > content_.length())
00055         content_.append(1, character);
00056     else
00057     {
00058         if (position < 0)
00059             content_.insert(0, 1, character);
00060         else
00061             content_.insert(position, 1, character);
00062     }
00063     
00064     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00065     computeWordRates();
00066 };
00067 
00068 
00077 void Text::addCharacter (const char &character)
00078 {
00079     // Call the generic 'addCharacter' function
00080     addCharacter(character, content_.length());
00081 }

00093 void Text::removeCharacter (const unsigned int &position)
00094 {
00095     if (position > content_.length())
00096         content_.erase(content_.end());
00097     else
00098     {
00099         if ( position < 0 )
00100             content_.erase(content_.begin());
00101         else
00102             content_.erase(position, 1);
00103     }
00104     
00105     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00106     computeWordRates();
00107 };
00108 
00109 
00116 void Text::updateWordRate (const std::string &word)
00117 {
00118     // Searches the word in the vector
00119     std::vector<WordRate>::iterator wordRates;
00120     for (wordRates = wordRates_.begin(); wordRates not_eq wordRates_.end(); ++wordRates)
00121     {
00122         // Updates its appearance rate
00123         if ( (*wordRates).first == word )
00124         {
00125             (*wordRates).second++;
00126             return;
00127         }
00128     }
00129     
00130     // The word was not stored, so here we adds its first appearance
00131     wordRates_.push_back(WordRate(word, 1));
00132 };
00133 
00134 
00142 void Text::computeWordRates ()
00143 {
00144     std::vector<std::string> words; // Vector to hold our words after removing spaces
00145     
00146     // Extract the words in text
00147     tokenize(words);
00148     
00149     // Update appearance rate of every word extracted
00150     std::vector<std::string>::iterator wordsIterator;
00151     for (wordsIterator = words.begin(); wordsIterator not_eq words.end(); ++wordsIterator)
00152         updateWordRate(*wordsIterator);
00153         
00154     // This sorting will improve future lookups
00155     std::sort (wordRates_.begin(), wordRates_.end());
00156 };
00157 
00158 
00166 void Text::tokenize(std::vector<std::string>& tokens, const std::string& delimiters) const
00167 {
00168     // Skip delimiters at the beginning of text
00169     std::string::size_type lastPos = content_.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
00170     
00171     // Find the first "non-delimiter"
00172     std::string::size_type pos     = content_.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00173     
00174     // Traverse the content until reaching its end
00175     while ( (std::string::npos not_eq pos) or (std::string::npos not_eq lastPos) )
00176     {
00177         // A word has been found, add it to the vector
00178         tokens.push_back(content_.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos));
00179         
00180         // Skip delimiters again
00181         lastPos = content_.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
00182         
00183         // Find the next "non-delimiter"
00184         pos = content_.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00185     }
00186 };
